Subject: Critical issue: Critical infrastructure issue in load-balancer (us-east-1)

Automated detection from monitoring system:

A critical issue has been detected with the load balancer service in the us-east-1 region. The load balancer is experiencing high resource utilization, with CPU usage at 94.97% and memory usage at 95.45%. This is likely due to increased traffic or insufficient resource allocation. As a result, all applications relying on this load balancer may face performance degradation, leading to increased latency or service interruptions for customers. This issue is recurring and requires immediate attention.

Service: load-balancer
Region: us-east-1
Severity: critical
Event Type: infrastructure
